DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Study Taris Placebo System
DOC.criteria: Healthy female volunteer , 18 55 year age Body weight > 100 lbs BMI ( body mass index ) within range 1830 kg/m2 A score less 11 pelvic pain/urgencyfrequency scale ( PUF ) Presence bladder urethra anatomical feature , opinion investigator , might prevent safe placement , indwell use , removal TARIS placebo system History significant urogenital surgery ( type bladder suspension , prolapse repair , incontinence procedure , vaginal hysterectomy ) History kidney stone formation Chronic recur bacterial viral infection urogenital system
